reviews.review_msg: One of my favourite professors! FNST 101 was such an important course. I would recommend everyone to take it with her. She is so understanding and kind. The midterms can be specific, but you should be fine as long as you review the readings beforehand.

Passionate prof who is truly invested in not only teaching material, but helping her students gain important knowledge. I thought this course was fascinating BUT the 3 hour lectures were a little rough. Grading was pretty lenient but fair. Definitely would recommend. Two exams, one short paper, and a few group assignments - in class.

Joyce is a really great teacher and has a lot of knowledge on the various topics studied in class. Attendance is mandatory in order to receive the participation marks and to well in the class overall, but other than that the midterms was pretty easy. Would love for this class to be required for all majors!
She is a good teacher, she will explain everything in the lecture very clearly. Easy marker.
